website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced marble run set that is fun and challenging for kids of various ages.
pros: Easy to put into different configurations
Brightly colored yet transparent components make it easy to see marbles
Parents exclaim about how fun it is to help kids assemble it
cons: Most of the marbles that come with the set are made of plastic, not glass
Rare pieces that don't fit together precisely have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Great toy aside from the plastic marbles.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these sets for our children over the last two years. It's one of our favorite family toys. That said, the newest set contained only 2 real, glass marbles. The rest were plastic! You have to put them together yourself and they are too lightweight to roll freely down the run. The plastic "marbles" are a cheap waste of materials and utterly useless in my opinion. If you buy yourself a bag of dollar store glass marbles to go with it, you'll be all set to have hours of fun with your kids. It would get 5 stars from me if the manufacturer provided all glass marbles and eliminated the plastic marbles all together from the set.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids really enjoy this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old grandson. Got it and put it together - took a little while. The directions are a series of pictures and you have to figure out what changed between them. Some pieces don't fit together tightly but most of them do. Kids have to be gentle or it falls apart at the looser joints. Kids are enjoying it and I think it is fun too. My only real complaint is that the 5 glass marbles are really tiny and the plastic snap together marbles are worthless so buy real 5/8 glass marbles if you don't have any. I am already thinking of buying another set to expand it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun running those marbles down the track... for a week :/
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his 5th birthday and he really enjoyed building the track and running the marbles down. He was the one begging for it because he has one at his preschool that they have to share. He spent at least couple of hours on the first day ... 30 mins or so everyday in the first week, then got distracted by his Nintendo Switch (Mario Cart) and hasn't touched this since.. Grandparents always get the better toys, that's all I have to say. :P p.s. the marbles come with the track are of smaller size, I would be careful if you have toddlers or pets at home.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, pieces breaking on day 2
customer_reviews.text: Quality: The base tall pieces and pins that hold them together are made of poor quality, they break easily even when used gently with care. Glass Marble pieces: they are a joke, about half the size of the plastic marble. Why? The game is fun but must be of good quality or won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Cg

customer_reviews.title: Hours of creative play
customer_reviews.text: Gave 5 stars because my 5yr old enjoyed designing his own marble track multiple different ways. The set comes with 5 clear glass marbles and 32 pieces are plastic halves that snap together to make white marbles. He was able to personalize the white marbles with markers.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: This is a great marble run set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great marble run set. Lots of pieces and various configurations. The bases have an additional small piece that locks them together so it is sturdy. We are only using the glass marbles with it. A great thinking activity for boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: What fun marble run! The pieces are nice and sturdy. They fit well together. Putting the marbles together is fun for al. I love using marble runs with my kids and kids I work with. They promote motor planning, problem solving, fine motor skills, creativity, and so much more. The sturdy pieces make this one less frustrating. Putting the marbles to gether add an extra component to the hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills aspect. Not to mention, it's great fun! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jjjj

customer_reviews.title: Marble ramps for creative and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This marble game delights my grandchildren! Always different, they use several skills as they figure out how to build the ramps and keep them stable. The racing marbles are met with cheers, applause and jumping up and down with glee. They are 3 and 6. The older teens and adults enjoy it almost as much. We get quite a few videos of the marble creations and races.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Gallt

customer_reviews.title: We got short changed.
customer_reviews.text: Someone short changed my 5 years old. Item listed as 127 pieces, 32 of which are glass marbles. But we received a box of 122 pieces and 5 glass marbles, 32 pieces of which happened to be half plastic balls. So once the white plastic balls are assembled- the kit we received only has 111 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: sad

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves this, my mom has a old set when I was young and he plays with it all the time at her house. The pieces are a bit smaller and not as sturdy as the one my mom has but still wonderful for my kiddo. The plastic marbles are ok, I bought some additional glass ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! I'm not a fan of the white plastic marbles that came with it, but I just bought a set of glass ones at the dollar store instead. My kid plays with it nonstop, and my husband enjoys playing with him. Our 2 year old likes to destroy it on a regular basis but so far nothing has broken. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: megmaholm

customer_reviews.title: Large set- lots of variety for set-up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great marble run set. I purchased this for my niece. We had a blast creating many different courses for the marbles- really the combinations are endless. This is a large set, which includes both glass and plastic marbles to roll down the track. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Steph McC

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, not stable
customer_reviews.text: This product is missing legs (YY-512, YY-506) and 1 foot (YY-501) ...see picture of what should be included and picture of what we actually received. Maybe the marble towers we build would stay up if we had these. Otherwise, currently, one of my kids has to hold it up while the other sends the marbles down. It’s from Santa so returning is not an option!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Klein

customer_reviews.title: defective part
customer_reviews.text: Great set but one of the bases is defective. 1-star rating but product is worth 5 stars if customer service can help us out with a replacement part! Otherwise, set won't stand without all the bases.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: My 5yo grandson and I play with this together
customer_reviews.text: Probably too advanced for him to play by himself but it a great activity for us to do together. I let him have first crack at trying to figure out how to put it together using the pictures and I am there for back up when he needs help. We started at #1 and are working our way through the rest of them. Great bonding activity for us
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 5 year old and 9 year old for xmas. They love playing this. They like to race to see which marble goes down first. There are a lot of pieces but it has an easy to follow along instructions on building some sets. We have not tried to create our own set yet. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Racing marble fun for hours
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old loves this! Great quality and lots of different parts for building options. I would give 5 stars but the set came with mostly plastic "marbles" that have to be snapped together and are just not working. Luckily we have plenty of marbles. The marble run is great but buy a pack or two of marbles to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay N. Steward

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and I put it together with my 7 and 5 year old. They loved it! The picture directions are easy enough to follow. And my two year old enjoyed stacking the tubes together to make tall towers. It is pretty sturdy when it is together. The marbles roll very well on it and overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily for very young children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 7-year-old who is very interested in creating and building. He has had hours of fun with it the first day that he had it. He enjoys taking it apart and redesigning his maze. However, the product comes with many plastic marbles that need to be put together and a few very small marbles (almost the size of large BB's). Since this is a game/toy for kids 3+ I don't think such small objects are good and I would discount the value of a real glass marble.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Keep scrolling past this one
customer_reviews.text: Very little instructions on how to build this. Couldn’t even fully put together because this set is missing 6 connector pieces. Not worth the money ... try a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great kid gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my grandmother had bought my little sister one years ago and we all loved it. My girls love assembling it in different ways and it makes them think about how things work. Very well-made and such a fun gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kina Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good price. 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to find this sturdy which is important because my child gets so frustrated when toys fall apart easily. The instructions were simple for her to follow at 9 and she was able to create her own. Loved the clear colors to watch the marbles. 😁👍
customer_reviews.author: Love is a Verb( Nicky )

customer_reviews.title: Good value toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twin 5-yr-old boys. Nothing has been broken, but the pieces are less stiff than expected. I think my boys would’ve preferred the brighter and thicker pieces. Having said that, they love to create with them and play with them often.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is a visually pleasing marble run. After 6 months some of the pieces don't stay together as they used to but we still love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Brown Family

customer_reviews.title: Are to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible for seven year old to put together alone. Grandpa can barely make it work. Pieces are difficult to fit together. Cat is the only one enjoying this toy chasing the marbles around in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic, Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: This marble run, while super fun, was very cheaply made. There are little pegs that hold it together when assembled and they snap after the first use. My kids played with it only a few times before it broke and made a lot of the pieces unusable. The marbles are plastic too. Not the quality we grew up with!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality compared to some of the junk I’ve gotten before. It’s a lot of pieces and best suited to kids at least 7 or older.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Over all great fun. Little flimsy when stack, but thats expected when it gets taller. My 3 and 6 year old sons love it. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest herron

customer_reviews.title: fun at all ages
customer_reviews.text: This marble run is a great toy. The variety of parts make it fun to put together. There are 6 plans you can follow to build, or you could design your own. My 8 year old likes this toy a lot, and us grown-ups enjoy it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning toy
customer_reviews.text: My son had to have these because this is one of the toys in his classroom. They have a hard time standing so you’ll have to set them up on a hard flat surface. Overall good quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a birthday Party
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew just fell in love with our birthday gift that he set it up before he opened the rest of his gifts in front of all of his guest. Needless to say, this was a success!
customer_reviews.author: IslandShopper

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun but buy your own marbles that are on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and so much fun. Was missing a piece but everything fits together well and my newly turned 3 year old loves it. The clip together plastic marbles that come with it are a joke though and some normal looking marbles can be too large to fit through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and a great tool for learning for a child
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a birthday gift for our grandson. This is a really good tool to help him develop mechanical skills, understanding how things work together.
customer_reviews.author: Darren D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: You loose track of time with so much fun
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves it!! And be honest so do I!!! It’s fun for all ages. Easy to build, can make as many mazes you want!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these a lot but they're just ok. sometimes it is hard to line up and they also don't have all the pieces to make the diagrams/ pictures they give you to copy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome toy my son loved it. It does require a little help from an adult but I had fun while I was helping.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to purchase this for my children after reading all the good reviews, however the pieces are so light weight and flimsy. my 9 year old daughter got very frustrated after working to put it together, only to have if fall down after adding every few pieces. I will try to return,although we already opened all the bags.
customer_reviews.author: OTmom

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and he plays it for hours.  !!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this more than his electronics. So it’s a win !!!! I wish the plastic was better quality but overall we are happy. A few cracked stems and pieces but we made due!
customer_reviews.author: Becca shops

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Takes full size and small marbles. Provides endless fun for kids. Works well with all the add on packs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jones

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased on somewhat similar to this one and it was horrible! This one has not fallen apart yet. Easy to assemble and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it and it went together easily. Plastic marbles are a joke so make sure to get real marbles for more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kec200

customer_reviews.title: very nice and well made !
customer_reviews.text: Bought the toy for my son, he is 7 years old , he totally loves it , he can set it up different way as he likes and it work great ! material and color is very nice too, my husband and me join to place with him sometimes too , definitively recommended !
customer_reviews.author: meiji

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids enjoyed playing with it and it was easy for them to use. Pieces haven't broken despite lots of play and fighting over who gets what. My only complaint is that the white plastic marbles they include are too light to turn the spinner and the glass marbles are smaller than standard marbles. The kids didn't seem to notice though.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this. Lots of combinations to build, easy to put together and also put away. Glad we chose this option
customer_reviews.author: CaliReader

customer_reviews.title: Must having for rainy days!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo much fun! This has been great keeping the Little’s ones busy so far this summer. Nice solid pieces, fit together easily. Lots of special pieces and ways to set it up, Great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!! Need real marbles!
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful. My Grandkids love it. I wish it came with real marbles so it would run smoother and not get clogged up.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fun For the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread! Ordered for my 4yr old, the whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Freethinker

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He loves it. I usually place it near a wall to make sure it stays up. My grandson plays hard
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. Comes with a few glass marbles and several plastic ones you put together. Glass ones work better.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great spatial gift for special needs child
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a grandson with severe autism - great gift that he loves and uses everyday
customer_reviews.author: Ashoggan

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun once you put it together. Too hard for my 5 year old to put together. Also had to put it up against a wall because it’s not too sturdy. But hours of fun once it’s up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great present for my kids. They had fun with it. I love that there were some directions for putting together a few different options.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son has played with this for hours. Easy to assemble, and lots of different arrangements can be made. I would suggest buying regular glass marbles though.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy 😉
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loved this and still plays with the set!! Hours upon hours of enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: Maree Burke

customer_reviews.title: Fairly sturdy & fun to put together.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loves it. So do his parents!!! They work together and build the different structures.
customer_reviews.author: QCGrandma

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun and provides hours of fun play time. We love it even dad gets into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy, had so much building and rebuilding with my grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: josh mauller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old son. I used to have one when I was a kid. This is a great in door toy That keeps kids and adults minds simulated. Can play with individually.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids (ages 6 and 4) love this toy. I plan to buy extensions for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this set for less money than the smaller set. Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: ricknaub

customer_reviews.title: Good choice as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 2 yr old, she loves it, assembly isn’t as easy as it looks but not too complicated either, definitely put it together when you have lots of free time on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Anzures

customer_reviews.title: Amazing marble run toy !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great quality. My son love it ! Only come with 4 real marbles the rest are white plastic marbles . However is a great marble run toy .
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: Simple fun
customer_reviews.text: Good for 6-11 year olds in my family. Can’t really beat it .
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your builder!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves it! We prefer the plastic marbles as they are bigger and being solid white, easier to see. I threw out the glass ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Y.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Would be better with larger pieces. But grandson loves it. Daughter hates to keep putting back together.
customer_reviews.author: crystal Jackman

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AND SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 3 (almost 4) year old he loves it and all the adults have fun playing with it too. At one point I'm pretty sure the 3 year old had to ask his uncles to let him play too since they had taken it over and weren't letting him play.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a good toy. My kids, ages 3, 8 and 10 all enjoy it. There was a support piece that broke early on, but other than that we haven't had any pieces break. The plastic marbles aren't great, but we had some other marbles that work in it, so this wasn't an issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Given to my 3 year old for Christmas. He loves it! He can independently connect the pieces, but requires some assistance to come up with a design. Pieces are sturdy, easy to connect, and colorful. This is a product that he'll continue to use as he grows up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT form of entertainment!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this toy! its a such a great way to kill time building and rearranging the tubes to build the track. my son is 8 and loves this. It is very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kasandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this marble run. He has spent many hours coming up with new creations. You will need to order glass marbles to go with it. The ones included are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: Not too stable but good enough
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, my son loves this. Either build it completely or it will fall. I tried creating little towers as pictured so he can play with multiple tracks at a time, but they will fall apart. Had to build it up in its entirety to stop the falling
customer_reviews.author: Jalana Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Missing pcs !!!
customer_reviews.text: We did not open the box to play with my two years old son till last night. On the box, it said it should includes 122 pcs + 5 glass marbles. We did have 5 marbles but we have way less than 122 pcs. We are missing a lot of pcs so we cannot assemble the model we want. And the model we assembled is easily to collapse. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Lo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Many options to build, various pieces. The glass marbles are a little too small. But the plastic ones work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Westergreen

customer_reviews.title: Good marble run
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grandson. He seems to enjoy it. The parts seem sturdy and he has a easy time putting them together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard for young children to set up
customer_reviews.text: Product is not quite sturdy enough for younger children to use by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: KF2007

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 7yo son. He absolutely loves it! Can pit it together himself using directions or can be creative and make his own design. Keeps asking me to buy another one so he can make it bigger!
customer_reviews.author: whitegold1321

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch, addicting to build
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to put together and fun to watch. Almost 3 year old really.enjoyed it but cant quite build himself yet. Wished there was an expansion package that was compatible. Different slides and extra pieces would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hindman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It took quite awhile to position the deisgn even with the diagram and adult help. So far 3 pieces have broken and it falls over easily in every set up. My grand children like it but its quite the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Speed

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: the kids saved up their money to buy this set and they love it. plenty of pieces to build different structures. good value.
customer_reviews.author: mlh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Children...
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect great quality and My baby loves it! Helps develop so many skills ... engineering ...mental exercise... constructive
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Forward

customer_reviews.title: As fun as I remembered!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked how easy it was to put together and that it wouldn’t fall apart (if you balance it out). Only medium sized marbles (or smaller) go through, the bigger ones get easily stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Alejo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This marble maze is so much fun. This is the 3rd marble maze that we have purchased for our son and it's by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: His and Hers

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good toy for kids improving some of the motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 5 year old love it. The instructions could be clearer, but with my help we did it! Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great but spin wheels don’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but it has a flaw. The windmill spins don’t work. They’re stiff and the ball stops. My son got it for Christmas and loves it! I bought it for the spins as an added effect so bummed they didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Dziadus

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun toy and great for STEM
customer_reviews.text: So fun!! My 5 year old lovesto make two separate tracks and race his marbles. Easy to assemble and take appart. We ended up thriwing away the box and keeping the pieces in a large locking tub.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it. Lots of ways to build it. It had a broken piece. It was missing some of the acrillic. Like the mold did not fill all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great marble run toy
customer_reviews.text: I have brought a few different sets before. This is the best set I got. It’s easy to set up, marble spins longer and doesn’t fall apart as easily. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: I searched all the options when I wanted to buy a marble run toy for my son (7). It was hard to choose but I am happy with this one. It's pretty easy to build, but still challenging. We love it. The only complaint is that it tips over sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hugebeck

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality is okay but some of the pieces did not fit snugly causing the assembly to break easily. Needs better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING and ENTERTAINING!
customer_reviews.text: This Marble Run set is AMAZING! For someone who doesn’t know how to read instructions, it was extremely EASY to put together. The pieces are sturdy and it comes with both glass and plastic marbles. It’s been a huge hit with my 4 year old and he has not stopped playing with it! I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it for my Grandson and it's a toss-up as to who likes it more
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Finger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5, got this for Christmas. He loves it! It’s sturdy and you can rearrange it in numerous ways.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: I play with this product more than my kids! Haha but really, a blast for all. Comes with plenty of marbles - wish they were the heavier, metal (?) ones we recieved in a different set rather than plastic but overall they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love this product. Good quality, sturdy, and has quite a few different tracks that make every build unique and fun.
customer_reviews.author: T Ryan

customer_reviews.title: it's fun
customer_reviews.text: this item was selected for age-appropriate children in MSK hospital
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. My husband and I had fun setting it up for Christmas. Plenty of pieces to keep recreating.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pavelski

customer_reviews.title: My boys LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY impressed by the quality, packaging, durability and FUN! This is a great toy for my 3 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren. They play with it for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Estes

customer_reviews.title: Played for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Although mine did have a missing piece, it was a piece that we could do without! My son loves this and plays with it for long periods of time. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

product_meta.title: Magicfly Marble Run Set, 127 Pcs Marble Race Track for Kids with Glass Marbles Upgrade Marble Works Set
feature_bullets: SAFE MARBLE SET FOR KIDS:We have already upgrade the quality of this marble set. They made of solid transparent ABS, absolutely non toxic, not easy to break or snapped. Smooth edges avoid scratching hands.
127 PCS MARBLE RUN SET: Ideal Marble Building Set Gift for Kids Age 3 + Year Old. Including 90 Translucent Marbulous Pieces + 32 DIY Marbles and extra 3 Glass Marbles.

EASY TO BUILD: This educational toy stem marble run construction toy set come with an easy assembly manual, When building the construction, kids cn develop hand-eye coordination, logical thinking, creativity, color and shape recognition!
GREAT INTERACTIVE TOY: Best for developing young minds and dexterity! It’s also good family fun, it is great toy for adult and child to participate in together, have hours of fun with parents!
PERFECT GIFT FOR CHRISTMAS BIRTHDAY: Ideal Marble Building Set Gift for boys and girls. It’s best for children party favor, after-school fun, birthday and Christmas gifts!
